In England, in the seven days to 17 June, there were 53,242 new confirmed cases (94.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 June, there were 39,394 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (13,848 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 June is 4,053,782 (7,202 cases per 100,000 population).
